p: The naturalistic antioxidants like phenolics, flavonoids, tannins, terpenoids, coumarins, curcuminoids, xanthons, and lignans are found in different plant products [ 37, 38] and they are renowned to preserve components of food which are able to oxidize easily from oxidation. This effect differ vastly relying on the growing conditions, extraction process, and a multitude sides of the chemical structure of the active constituents, i.e., the amount, position of hydroxyl groups, molecular weight, particle size, concentration of solvent, time of contact, temperature, and mass-solvent ratio, between others aspects [ 39].
